name: The Failures Of Felix
description:
After being locked in his room by his mother because of his night terrors, Felix has to try and distract himself by playing with his toys. Play games to help Felix distract himself from his nightmares that are coming too life.

Created as part of Ludum Dare 37

Game created by Jacob Williams(@Netaphous), Natalia Patkiewicz, Jonathan Brimble and Quinn Nolan(@quinngamedev).
